page.title: 05FARMING 3-DALGINCH FARM STAR
page.content: { 1.LOCATION-}Dalginch is a farm just outside Star, approximately 2.5 miles from Markinch and 3.25 miles from Kennoway.{2.ACREAGE-}It has 100 acres. One field takes 10 tons of fertiliser and some 26.{3.USES OF LAND}-It is an arable and pastural farm where cabbage, cauliflower, peas, winter turnips and barley is grown. Some grain is taken to Hull for export. Dalginch has beef cattle. We go to the market to buy bulls and we take our bulls as well to Perth & Stirling markets.{4.BUILDINGS-}Dalginch has old buildings at the stock yard. The buildings are about 650 years old. Some are so old they are falling down now.{5.EMPLOYEES-}We have lots of employees at Dalginch. They are my dad, Alexander Nicol Black,my uncle Sydney Nicol, my Cousin Fraser Nicol and the Joiner David Milne. (cont 6)
